title: JD Vance defends Trump’s racist Obama video, says it’s ‘not a real controversy’
summary_full: In a recent public address, US Vice President JD Vance dismissed the uproar over a controversial AI-generated video depicting the Obamas as apes, which was circulated by former President Donald Trump. Vance emphasized that this matter has moved past the point of effective discussion and highlighted the importance of focusing on pressing issues facing the nation.
